languages.text: "Ну а ты, дитя Крудараха. Каково это — знать, что ты не смогла спасти ни себя, ни свою семью, ни драгоценный мир-корабль?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"
languages.original_text: "Ну а ты, дитя Крудараха. Каково это — знать, что ты не смогла спасти ни себя, ни свою семью, ни драгоценный мир-корабль?"

traits.locale_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or the precious Craftworld?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or the precious Craftworld?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or the precious Craftworld?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or the precious Craftworld?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"
"What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

languages.text: « Et vous, enfant de Crudarach ? Quel effet cela fait-il de savoir que vous avez été incapable de vous sauver, de sauver votre famille ou le précieux vaisseau-monde ? »
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous, enfant de Crudarach ? Quel effet cela fait-il de savoir que vous avez été incapable de vous sauver, de sauver votre famille ou le précieux vaisseau-monde ? »

languages.text: “那你呢，方舟世界的子嗣？你无法拯救自己，无法拯救你的家人，也无法拯救你珍贵的方舟世界。当你意识到这一切的时候，你是什么感觉？”
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: “那你呢，方舟世界的子嗣？你无法拯救自己，无法拯救你的家人，也无法拯救你珍贵的方舟世界。当你意识到这一切的时候，你是什么感觉？”

languages.text: 「クルダラの子よ、貴様はどうなのだ？己自身、家族、そして大切な方舟を救えなかったことをどう思っている？」
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: 「クルダラの子よ、貴様はどうなのだ？己自身、家族、そして大切な方舟を救えなかったことをどう思っている？」

languages.text: "Was ist mit Euch, Kind von Crudarach? Was ist das für ein Gefühl zu wissen, dass Ihr Euch weder selbst, noch Eure Familie oder Euer kostbares Weltenschiff retten konntet?"
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: "Was ist mit Euch, Kind von Crudarach? Was ist das für ein Gefühl zu wissen, dass Ihr Euch weder selbst, noch Eure Familie oder Euer kostbares Weltenschiff retten konntet?"

languages.text: «¿Y tú, hija de Crudarach? ¿Qué se siente al saber que no pudiste salvarte a ti misma, a tu familia ni a tu preciado mundo astronave?».
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y tú, hija de Crudarach? ¿Qué se siente al saber que no pudiste salvarte a ti misma, a tu familia ni a tu preciado mundo astronave?».

languages.text: "Peki ya sen Crudarach'ın çocuğu? Kendini, aileni veya o çok değerli gemidünyanı kurtaramadığını bilmek nasıl bir duygu?"
languages.original_text: "What about you, child of Crudarach? How does it feel to know that you could not save yourself, your family, or your precious craftworld?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki ya sen Crudarach'ın çocuğu? Kendini, aileni veya o çok değerli gemidünyanı kurtaramadığını bilmek nasıl bir duygu?"
